Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Antioch
There was one other sighting in Antioch on or around January 27th 2012
Summary: I saw something in the sky i have no clue what it was it didn't act like a helicopter
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking in mountaire park in antioch when i saw what i thought was a helicopter. i didn't take notice to it at first. then i said to my friend i think thats a ufo. then we watched it then it started goin in a path then stopping very gentlyfor a few seconds then going even faster and stopping gently then changing directiong. the lights on it were pulsating almost like a wave. the lights were long looking and red. we followed the thing pretty far then it just disapeared. It was hands down the craziest thing i have ever seen in my entire life.
